remarks: Function-builder for derivative: derivative of a constant.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvmptconst.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptconst.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t S ) ) $.
dvmptconst.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
dvmptconst $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. A |-> B ) ) = ( x e. A |-> 0 ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d S x $.
$d ph x $.
